question.text: Mark the incorrect statement for DNA.

options.text: The ratios between Adenine and Thymine and Guanine and Cytosine are constant and equal to one in dsDNA.
DNA is an acidic substance present in the nucleus was first identified by Friedrich Meischer in 1869.
The X-ray diffraction data was used for discovery of the DNA
Two strands are anti-parallel to each other.

solution.text: In 1953, James Watson and Francis Crick, based on the X-ray diffraction data produced by Maurice Wilkins and Rosalind Franklin, proposed a very simple but famous Double Helix model for the structure of DNA. They have not used this data for the discovery of DNA. DNA as an acidic substance present in the nucleus was first identified by Friedrich Meischer in 1869.
